title: Pretend You're Mine
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.Pretending she was mine seemed so harmless in the beginning...  Carrie Callihan's life is finally coming together. Not only has she launched her own interior design business, but she has a loving fiance she wouldn't trade for anything.  But when she realizes he's not the man she thought he was, she finds herself in a desperate situation that just goes from bad to worse.  Now the only person that can save her from losing everything is her new client, Ben Abbott, the sexy son of one of the most powerful men in New York City.  But as Carrie's luck would have it, he wants her for a lot more than her good taste.  ***This new adult romance series contains mature content, adult language, and several characters who also feature in the Tempted Series by Hazel Kelly, namely Will & Ella.
author: Hazel Kelly
